name: Blue Cube Sim
description:
What is Blue Cube Sim?

This game is a submission for the Low Effort game jam. Just watch blue cubes go along what-I-guess-you-could-say is a "conveyor belt" and destroy the cube when you want to stop.

Maybe you just wanna kill the time cause you're bored or have something playing on your display - Blue Cube Sim might be for you!

-OMOEXPERIENCES
